definition: able-bodied man (capable of fighting in a war)
Zhuang ethnic group of Guangxi, the PRC's second most numerous ethnic group
to strengthen/strong/robust
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
surname Ding

sentences.english: A man never knew when he might be conscripted.
sentences.chinese: 男人根本不知道什麼時候會被抓壯丁。

sentences.english: The nation levied all able-bodied man for the war.
sentences.chinese: 國家徵召所有壯丁參戰。
